title: Smart Auction Bidding Platform
shortDescription: Academic Duo Project ‚Äî Built a full-stack online auction platform inspired by eBay, allowing users to create listings, place real-time bids, and manage auctions via a modern web interface. Integrated mock payment flows, user authentication, and dynamic countdown timers. Developed with Next.js, Node.js, and Tailwind CSS. Focused on reliability, user experience, and full auction lifecycle ‚Äî without real currency integration.
